item.title: Ubuntu Network config using netplan
item.description: Static IP Address example /etc/netplan/template.txt # -------------------------- # Static IP Address Example # -------------------------- network: version: 2 renderer: networkd ethernets: eth0: dhcp4: no dhcp6: no addresses: [172.16.57.999/24] gateway4: 172.16.57.1 nameservers: addresses: [172.16.57.5,172.16.57.8] DHCP IP Address example # -------------------------- # DHCP IP Address Example - Single interface # -------------------------- network: version: 2 renderer: networkd ethernets: eth0: dhcp4: yes Trunk example eth0 with static address eth1 with trunk/vlan interfaces # -------------------------- # TRUNK interface example # -------------------------- network: version: 2 ethernets: eth0: addresses: - 172.

item.title: Clean White Theme for Hugo
item.description: Clean White Theme for Hugo CleanWhite is a clean, elegant, but fully functional blog theme for Hugo. Here is a live demo site using this theme. It is based on huxblog Jekyll Theme and Clean Blog Jekyll Theme. These two upstream projects have done awesome jobs to create a blog theme, what I’m doing here is porting it to Hugo, of which I like the simplicity and the much faster

About Me I am Ron Kelley - Team Leader, Mentor, Infrastructure Architect, and hard-core Technology Nerd. My passion lies in the entire infrastructure stack - from hardware, to software, to firmware. I love building out high-performance compute environments ranging from single-host virtualization servers to multi-rack configurations that span multiple networks, compute farms, and storage systems. A self-starter by nature, I enjoy deploying virtualization clusters, installing Linux via PXE, configuring IPSec tunnels on pfSense firewalls, setting up haproxy and nginx app stacks, configuring LXD containers, and lots of other cool stuff.
Machine learning学习笔记 Coursera 在线课程 Machine learning 笔记讲师: 吴恩达(Andrew Ng) 课程地址：https://www.coursera.org/lear
